EmailTemplate.description: Client SCHEDULED Callback – Send Prior to 1st Attempt
EmailTemplate.name: Pre Scheduled Call
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to QuickBooks Enterprise Onboarding Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Account #{!Contact.CAN__c}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations on your recent purchase of QuickBooks Enterprise. My name is Chadwick Farrell As your Onboarding Account Manager, I will be working with you throughout the Enterprise Onboarding Process.
As requested, I will call you at [phone number] on [date] at [time] to schedule your installation/data migration and review the available trainings to get you set up for success.
If you have any questions in the meantime, please don’t hesitate to reach out to me at 800-498-7401 Ext 1447 or Chadwick_farrell@intuit.com.
We at Intuit value your business and are continuously working to improve the experience we provide to our most valued customers and are excited to offer you this new benefit.
I look forward to helping you successfully transition to your new QuickBooks Enterprise Software.
Chadwick Farrell ~ Account Manager Intuit ~ Simplify the business of life Work Phone: 800-498-7401 ext 1447
This transmittal is intended only for the use of the individual or entity to which it is addressed and may contain information that is privileged, confidential and exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If the reader of this transmittal is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible for delivering the transmittal to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited.
